thread.title: Great location, staff friendly, room large and clean
thread.title_full: Great location, staff friendly, room large and clean - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jax40-10
title: Great location, staff friendly, room large and clean
text:
We had a very nice stay in this hotel, great location. The extra tax of $33 dollars a night is a bit much. When booking a hotel you would normally pay the fixed fee for the duration, not an additional fee when checking out.
I also rang the hotel a couple of weeks beforehand because it was my boyfriend's special birthday and requested a bottle of bubbly in the room. There was no bubbly, and on arrival only then found out that the hotel did not actually have room service. So a bit disappointing on a couple of points.
Room Tip: Ask for a higher floor, much quieter See more room tips
